p.s: Abe is in a really complicated situation, he has such as Amir a vulnerable immegrationimmigration status.

Because of that he belongs to a community organisations such as the FBIFederal Bureau of Investigation pick people from and force them to do things for them but not like working for or helping, more like blackmailing them.
Abe comes up together with Emily to Amir because he does not know what to do.

He calls a co-worker of him named Ken who was the lawyer on a recent case.
Abe doesn't pick up that's why Amir speaks on his mailbox saingsaying he should call back because it's urgent.
